articles.author: Matt Caswell
articles.heading: How the moon landing was staged
articles.article: Before we add data to our store through our Ember application, we can manually import the data from our hard-coded model hook directly into Firebase. This wil7nl allow us see what it looks like in Firebase, and understand how data arrives from Ember. Pre-loading the database with hard-coded data in this manner is known as seeding the database. Eventually we will get rid of this pre-seeded data, and instead allow users to create new rentals directly through the user interface of our application.
